What are the must-know #rstats package(s) for your discipline? I work in #airquality and find the openair package by @DavidCarslaw super useful. https://t.co/yuBAXfChNZ . Especially calendar plots, windrose and time averaging functions https://t.co/2APVs5yvG1

Just discovered an amazing #rstats üì¶ {livecode} - lets you broadcast your live coding from RStudio onto a webpage that auto updates as you write code. 

Looks fantastic for teaching/presentations, you have to try it out to see its coolness! 

https://t.co/XN0joa2Wi1 by @rundel

Also in the works is a massive speed boost for making spatial objects 

In this example I'm converting a 400,000 row data.frame into 100,000 polygons in 50ms (down from 30 seconds!) #rstats #rspatial https://t.co/ocCgSkmjKf
